name: MokiMobility
tag_list: ipad-management, ipad-kiosk, ipad-pos, mobile-device-management, mdm, cloud, ios-management, android-management, tablet-management
overview:
MokiMobility provides a cloud-base mobile device management (MDM) platform with a web-based management console and device management APIs.

MokiMobility’s +MDM platform is designed for tablet solutions used as single-purpose devices, (i.e., iPad Kiosks, Retail Point-of-Sale (POS), digital signage, etc.) MokiMobility’s platform is used to manage iOS and Android devices.

Developers, ISVs and solution providers use MokiMobility APIs to integrate device management functions into their own tablet solutions, providing a more complete solution for their customers.

milestones.description: MokiMobility announces +MDM - Cloud-based Mobile Device Management for single-purpose devices.
